item.title: The LG Stylus 2 will make its first appearance at MWC 2016
item.description:
LG will introduce the LG Stylus 2 at the upcoming Mobile World Congress 2016 in Barcelona, Spain. Source: LG. The LG Stylus 2. The LG Stylus 2 is slimmer and lighter than its predecessor, measuring 7.4mm thick and weighing 145g. This follow-up to the G4 Stylus boasts a 5.7" HD display for an enhanced viewing experience. Using the LG Stylus 2 mimics the experience of writing with a traditional pen and notepad...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-lg-stylus-2-will-make-its-first-appearance-at-mwc-2016/

item.title: Instaviz 2.0, a tool for conceptualizing iOS, makes its debut
item.description:
Pixelglow Software, a company known for creating user-friendly business software, has released Instaviz 2.0. Initially launched in December 2008, Instaviz is a leading diagramming app for iOS that enables users to visualize, refine, and share their ideas. [Image of Instaviz diagram] Source: Pixelglow Software. Click on the image to view a larger version. Instaviz consistently ranks among the top 100 business apps on the App Store, boasting over 17,700 downloads and an average user rating of three and a half stars...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/instaviz-2-0-a-tool-for-conceptualizing-ios-makes-its-debut/

item.title: The new iPad Air 2 from Apple is thinner
item.description:
Apple unveiled its slimmest iPad yet, the iPad Air 2, at a highly anticipated event on October 16th. The updated iPad boasts an enhanced Retina display for improved contrast, a richer color palette, and superior cameras. Available in gold, alongside the classic silver and space gray, both the iPad Air 2 and the new iPad mini 3 feature Touch ID. In the US, these models will also offer Apple Pay, a new payment system...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-new-ipad-air-2-from-apple-is-thinner/
